hackathon-description-text: The ILM Innovation Weekend 2017 is your opportunity to build businesses and products that serve the needs of Muslims around the world, an untapped market of over 1 billion people!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Co-Founder at Tiny Hearts (acq by Shopify in 2016)

hackathon-rules: Please adhere to Islamic dress code and Islamic behaviour for the duration of the event!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=341 Yonge St, Toronto, ON M5B 1S1, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 341 Yonge St, Toronto, ON M5B 1S1, Canada
